mapper.select: select ca.*,w.*,a.* from collection_actor ca inner join wuser w on ca.user_id=w.id inner join actor a on ca.actor_id=a.id where w.id=#{user_id}
select cd.*,w.*,d.* from collection_director cd inner join wuser w on cd.user_id=w.id inner join director d on cd.director_id=d.id where w.id=#{user_id}
